summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Danie's University Grove Addition, being the alley between East 45th Street and East 47th Street, 4th Avenue Northeast and 5th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 112668 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
